sections.problem_intro: In many companies, managing occupational health and safety (OHS) remains fragmented, manual, and inefficient.
problem_points: Processes scattered across paper, emails, and spreadsheets.
Lack of traceability and visibility into employee health.
High non-compliance risks and poor management of OHS obligations.
Productivity loss due to poorly tracked medical visits and sick leaves.
sections.solution_text: MediWork℠ is a modern SaaS platform that centralizes all OHS activities in a single, secure, and scalable digital space.
solution_points: Complete medical follow-up for employees and dependents.
Integrated management of medical infrastructures (clinics, labs, pharmacies, maternity wards).
Digital management of prevention programs (malaria, HIV/AIDS, cancers, occupational risks).
Analytical dashboards for leadership, HR, and OHS managers.

features_cards.title: Health Professionals
bullets: Digital tools for doctors, nurses, midwives.
Traceability of care, prescriptions, and exams.

features_cards.title: Medical Infrastructures
bullets: Digitized inventory of clinics, labs, pharmacies.
Track maternity wards, ambulances, critical equipment.

features_cards.title: Work Environment
bullets: Monitor exposures: noise, heat, vibrations, vapors.

features_cards.title: Employers & HR
bullets: Consolidated reporting across sites and companies.

features_cards.title: Public Health Programs
bullets: Tracked distribution of nets, kits, and condoms.

features_cards.title: Analytics & Reporting
bullets: Consolidated comparisons by site or sector.

features_cards.title: Security & Compliance
bullets: User access control and strong authentication.
Encryption and traceability of medical data.

features_cards.title: Interoperability & Integrations
bullets: Connect with hospital and clinic systems.
Integrate with insurers, mutuals, and partners.
Open APIs for extensions and third-party services.

features_list: Employees & dependents: medical visits (onboarding, routine, return), occupational diseases, sick leaves, reassignment.
Health professionals: digital tools for doctors, nurses, midwives, technicians (agenda, traceability, indicators).
Infrastructures: digitized inventory of clinics, maternity wards, labs, pharmacies, ambulances.
Work environment: exposures (noise, heat, vibrations, vapors, pesticides) and accident investigations.
Public health programs: malaria, HIV/AIDS, cancers — screening, prevention, awareness, nets, condoms distribution.
Employers & HR: dashboards, reporting, legal compliance, consolidated indicators.
Analytics & reporting: real-time KPIs and automatic monthly/annual reports per site or company.
sections.cta_title: Start transforming your workplace health & safety today.

benefits: Reduce non-compliance risks with full traceability.
Improve employee health and safety via proactive prevention.
Gain productivity with centralized digital workflows.
Optimize decision-making with analytics and interactive dashboards.
Reduce inequalities in access to care between urban and rural areas.
